Food & Beverage
(239) 574-7262 ext. 104
DIRECTIONS
From Fort Myers/Naples via Highway 41
From Highway 41, turn west on Colonial Boulevard and take Midpoint Toll Bridge into Cape Coral which turns into Veterans Memorial Parkway
Turn right on Skyline Boulevard for 0.6 miles
Turn left on to S.W. 19th Lane and follow signs into Club
From Fort Myers/Naples via I-75
From I-75, take exit 136 Colonial Boulevard west and take Midpoint Toll Bridge into Cape Coral which turns into Veterans Memorial Parkway
Turn right on Skyline Boulevard for 0.6 miles
Turn left on to S.W. 19th Lane and follow signs into Club

MEMBERSHIP
To receive a Membership Information package via email, just complete the form on the right and hit SUBMIT.
Palmetto-Pine Country Club is a semi-private, privately owned club. Along with our newly renovated 18-hole championship golf course designed by renowned architect Arthur Hills, the club has many other amenities to offer such as our full service dining, banquet and bar facilities. The clubhouse also features the men's and ladies' locker and card rooms. If you are seeking an active social schedule, we have a large Bocce group and many non-golf social events.
A membership at Palmetto Pine Country Club is a great addition to your little slice of paradise in the Sunshine State, complete with the relaxation you’ve been looking for and friends that become like family.
For information or to arrange a club tour, please contact:
Scott Beaugureau @
[email protected]
or
Matt Turza @
[email protected]
or
Our Clubhouse @ (239) 574-7262; or
Our Proshop @ (239) 574-2141
